usage.title: How to Download Instagram Content
steps: Open Instagram and find the content
Copy the post or story link
Paste the URL in our downloader
Select the content type and quality
Download and save to your device

faq.question: Can I download Instagram stories?
faq.answer: Yes, you can download Instagram stories before they expire. Just copy the story link and paste it in our downloader.

faq.question: Does it work with private accounts?
faq.answer: Our downloader works with public content. For private accounts, you need permission from the account owner.

faq.question: Can I download Instagram reels?
faq.answer: Yes! Our downloader fully supports Instagram reels and maintains the original video quality.

faq.question: What about IGTV videos?
faq.answer: IGTV videos are fully supported. You can download long-form Instagram videos in HD quality.

faq.question: Is there a size limit?
faq.answer: No size limits! Download Instagram content of any length or file size.
